metadata.Title: CVE-2017-9996 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.Description: The cdxl_decode_frame function in libavcodec/cdxl.c in FFmpeg 2.8.x before2.8.12, 3.0.x before 3.0.8, 3.1.x before 3.1.8, 3.2.x before 3.2.5, and3.3.x before 3.3.1 does not exclude the CHUNKY format, which allows remoteattackers to cause a denial of service (heap-based buffer overflow andapplication crash) or possibly have unspecified other impact via a craftedfile.

criterions.comment: libav package in trusty/esm is affected and needs fixing.
